content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs. However, based on scientific research, jealousy can be a natural and normal emotional response to a perceived threat to a relationship. In small amounts, it can even serve as a motivation to improve oneself or a relationship. However, when jealousy becomes intense and irrational, it can become harmful to relationships and individuals involved. It is important to communicate openly and honestly about feelings of jealousy and work together to address any underlying issues.
